metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14727 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
logger.c in the logger plugin in WeeChat before 1.9.1 allows a crash via strftime date/time specifiers, because a buffer is not initialized.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-14727` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

weechat - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1
weechat-core - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1
weechat-curses - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1
weechat-guile - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1
weechat-headless - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1
weechat-lua - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1
weechat-perl - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1
weechat-php - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1
weechat-plugins - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1
weechat-python - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1
weechat-ruby - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1
weechat-tcl - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: weechat package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.1-1ubuntu1').
